free.workarounds
Class FixedJTextField

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
                  javax.swing.JTextField
                      free.workarounds.FixedJTextField
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class FixedJTextField
extends javax.swing.JTextField

A fix of JTextField. Fixes the following bugs:

  • Ibeam cursor not appearing on TextField or TextArea in editmode.
  • in JTextComponent should activate DefaultButton.
  • JTextField displays multiple Line.
  • Disabled JTextField background should be control colour in Windows L&F.
  • JTextField draws out of bounds.

See Also:
Serialized Form
